story.action: I want to authenticate into the Business Management System using my secure credentials
story.reason: Ensure security and prevent data leakage/unauthorized operations

ac_map.AC-002: Email address must be unique within the system.
ac_map.AC-004: Corporate domain restrictions must be configurable.
ac_map.AC-005: Authentication fails for non-existent email addresses.
ac_map.AC-006: Passwords must be compared using hash values.
ac_map.AC-007: Password comparison must use constant-time algorithms (Anti-timing attack).
ac_map.AC-008: Passwords must be stored using bcrypt or equivalent/stronger algorithms.
ac_map.AC-010: Plain text passwords must not be output to DB, logs, or responses.
ac_map.AC-011: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.
ac_map.AC-012: Configurable rules for combinations of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.
ac_map.AC-013: Password input fields must be masked.
ac_map.AC-014: Account lockout after 5 consecutive failed attempts.
ac_map.AC-018: Security logs generated upon lockout events.
ac_map.AC-019: Brute-force alerts for excessive attempts from a single IP.
ac_map.AC-020: Issue a JWT upon successful authentication.
ac_map.AC-021: JWT must contain user_id, role, and expiration date.
ac_map.AC-024: Invalid or tampered tokens must be rejected.
ac_map.AC-026: Tokens must only be transmitted over HTTPS.
ac_map.AC-027: Secure attribute must be set when using cookies.
ac_map.AC-028: HttpOnly attribute must be set when using cookies.
ac_map.AC-031: Anti-session fixation measures must be implemented.
ac_map.AC-032: Use parameterized queries/ORM against SQL injection.
ac_map.AC-036: Logs include user_id, IP, User-Agent, and timestamp.
ac_map.AC-037: Logs must be stored in tamper-evident storage.
ac_map.AC-038: Log retention period must be configurable.
ac_map.AC-039: Apply rate limiting to the login API.
ac_map.AC-040: Return HTTP 429 when rate limit is exceeded.
ac_map.AC-041: Authentication process must support asynchronous I/O.
ac_map.AC-042: Target response time for login API is within 200ms.
ac_map.AC-043: Error responses must not reveal internal system information.
ac_map.AC-044: Transition to business screens only upon successful authentication.
ac_map.AC-045: Initial screen branching based on role permissions.
ac_map.AC-046: Login state maintained until token expiration.
ac_map.AC-048: Invalidated tokens managed via a blacklist (Redis).

groups.label: Authentication Basics
groups.rationale: These ACs cover the fundamental aspects of user authentication, including email validation and password requirements.

groups.label: Password Security
groups.rationale: This group focuses on the security measures related to password handling and storage.

groups.label: JWT Management
groups.rationale: These ACs pertain to the generation, signing, and validation of JWTs for secure authentication.

groups.label: Session Security
groups.rationale: This group includes measures to protect user sessions and prevent common vulnerabilities.

groups.label: Logging and Monitoring
groups.rationale: These ACs focus on logging successful and failed login attempts for auditing purposes.

groups.label: Security Logging
groups.rationale: This group is dedicated to security-related logs, including lockout events and brute-force alerts.

groups.label: API Rate Limiting
groups.rationale: These ACs ensure that the login API is protected against excessive requests.

groups.label: Error Handling and Performance
groups.rationale: This group addresses error handling and performance requirements for the authentication process.

tasks.title: Implement email and password authentication
tasks.description:
Goal: Enable users to authenticate using their email and password.
Changes: Create authentication endpoint and logic.
Acceptance checks: Verify successful login with valid credentials.

tasks.title: Ensure unique email addresses in the system
tasks.description:
Goal: Prevent duplicate email addresses during registration.
Changes: Update database schema and validation logic.
Acceptance checks: Attempt to register with an existing email and verify failure.

tasks.title: Implement email format validation
tasks.description:
Goal: Validate email format during registration and login.
Changes: Add regex validation for email fields.
Acceptance checks: Test various email formats for acceptance and rejection.

tasks.title: Add corporate domain restrictions configuration
tasks.description:
Goal: Allow configuration of allowed corporate domains.
Changes: Implement settings for domain restrictions.
Acceptance checks: Verify login with allowed and disallowed domains.

tasks.title: Handle authentication failure for non-existent emails
tasks.description:
Goal: Provide feedback for non-existent email addresses during login.
Changes: Update authentication logic to check email existence.
Acceptance checks: Attempt login with a non-registered email and verify error message.

tasks.title: Enforce minimum password length requirement
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure passwords are at least 8 characters long.
Changes: Add validation for password length during registration.
Acceptance checks: Test registration with passwords shorter than 8 characters.

tasks.title: Implement configurable password complexity rules
tasks.description:
Goal: Allow configuration of password complexity requirements.
Changes: Create settings for uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.
Acceptance checks: Verify registration with various password combinations.

tasks.title: Mask password input fields in UI
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure password fields are masked for security.
Changes: Update frontend input fields to mask passwords.
Acceptance checks: Verify that password input is not visible.

tasks.title: Implement password hashing using bcrypt
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure passwords are securely hashed.
Changes: Integrate bcrypt for password hashing.
Acceptance checks: Verify that passwords are hashed using bcrypt.

tasks.title: Add salt to password hashes
tasks.description:
Goal: Enhance password security with salt.
Changes: Implement salting mechanism for password hashes.
Acceptance checks: Confirm that all password hashes include a unique salt.

tasks.title: Implement constant-time password comparison
tasks.description:
Goal: Prevent timing attacks during password verification.
Changes: Use constant-time algorithms for password comparison.
Acceptance checks: Test for timing attack vulnerabilities.

tasks.title: Ensure plain text passwords are not logged
tasks.description:
Goal: Protect sensitive data from exposure.
Changes: Update logging mechanisms to exclude plain text passwords.
Acceptance checks: Review logs to confirm no plain text passwords are present.

tasks.title: Implement account lockout after failed attempts
tasks.description:
Goal: Enhance security against brute-force attacks.
Changes: Add logic to lock accounts after 5 failed login attempts.
Acceptance checks: Test account lockout functionality.

tasks.title: Make lockout duration configurable
tasks.description:
Goal: Allow flexibility in lockout duration.
Changes: Implement configuration for lockout duration.
Acceptance checks: Verify that lockout duration can be changed in settings.

tasks.title: Prevent authentication for locked accounts
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure locked accounts cannot log in.
Changes: Add checks to prevent authentication for locked accounts.
Acceptance checks: Test login attempts for locked accounts.

tasks.title: Implement admin unlock functionality for accounts
tasks.description:
Goal: Allow administrators to unlock accounts.
Changes: Create admin interface for unlocking accounts.
Acceptance checks: Verify that admins can unlock locked accounts.

tasks.title: Hash password comparison tests
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure password comparison is secure.
Changes: Write tests for hashed password comparison.
Acceptance checks: Confirm tests pass for constant-time comparison.

tasks.title: Test account lockout functionality
tasks.description:
Goal: Validate account lockout mechanism.
Changes: Create tests for lockout after failed attempts.
Acceptance checks: Ensure tests confirm lockout behavior.

tasks.title: Implement JWT Issuance on Authentication
tasks.description:
Goal: Issue a JWT upon successful authentication.
Changes: Implement the logic to generate a JWT after verifying user credentials.
Acceptance checks: Verify that a JWT is returned upon successful login.

tasks.title: Add User Information to JWT
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure JWT contains necessary user information.
Changes: Modify JWT payload to include user_id, role, and expiration date.
Acceptance checks: Validate that the JWT contains the correct user information.

tasks.title: Implement JWT Signing Mechanism
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure JWT is securely signed.
Changes: Integrate a signing algorithm to sign the JWT.
Acceptance checks: Verify that the JWT is signed and can be validated.

tasks.title: Implement Token Signature Verification
tasks.description:
Goal: Verify the signature of incoming JWTs.
Changes: Implement middleware to check the signature of the JWT on each request.
Acceptance checks: Ensure that only valid tokens are accepted.

tasks.title: Handle Invalid or Tampered Tokens
tasks.description:
Goal: Reject invalid or tampered tokens.
Changes: Implement logic to return an error for invalid tokens.
Acceptance checks: Test with tampered tokens to ensure they are rejected.

tasks.title: Configure JWT Expiration Settings
tasks.description:
Goal: Allow configurable expiration for JWTs.
Changes: Implement a configuration setting for JWT expiration time.
Acceptance checks: Verify that the expiration time can be set and is respected.

tasks.title: Ensure JWT Transmission Over HTTPS
tasks.description:
Goal: Securely transmit JWTs.
Changes: Enforce HTTPS for all token transmissions.
Acceptance checks: Test that tokens are only sent over HTTPS.

tasks.title: Set Secure Attribute for Cookies
tasks.description:
Goal: Enhance cookie security.
Changes: Set the Secure attribute for cookies that store JWTs.
Acceptance checks: Verify that cookies are marked as Secure.

tasks.title: Set HttpOnly Attribute for Cookies
tasks.description:
Goal: Prevent client-side access to cookies.
Changes: Set the HttpOnly attribute for JWT cookies.
Acceptance checks: Ensure that cookies cannot be accessed via JavaScript.

tasks.title: Set SameSite Attribute for Cookies
tasks.description:
Goal: Mitigate CSRF attacks.
Changes: Set the SameSite attribute for cookies storing JWTs.
Acceptance checks: Verify that the SameSite attribute is correctly applied.

tasks.title: Implement CSRF Protection Tokens
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure CSRF protection for user sessions.
Changes: Implement mandatory CSRF tokens in the authentication flow.
Acceptance checks: Verify that CSRF tokens are generated and validated correctly.

tasks.title: Develop Anti-Session Fixation Measures
tasks.description:
Goal: Prevent session fixation attacks.
Changes: Implement measures to regenerate session IDs upon login.
Acceptance checks: Ensure that session IDs change after authentication.

tasks.title: Maintain Login State Until Token Expiration
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure user login state is maintained.
Changes: Implement logic to keep the session active until the token expires.
Acceptance checks: Verify that sessions remain active until token expiration.

tasks.title: Invalidate Tokens Upon User Logout
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure tokens are invalidated when a user logs out.
Changes: Implement token invalidation logic during logout.
Acceptance checks: Verify that tokens are no longer valid after logout.

tasks.title: Manage Invalidated Tokens via Blacklist in Redis
tasks.description:
Goal: Manage invalidated tokens effectively.
Changes: Implement a blacklist for invalidated tokens using Redis.
Acceptance checks: Verify that invalidated tokens are stored and checked against the blacklist.

tasks.title: Implement logging for successful logins
tasks.description:
Goal: To ensure successful login attempts are logged.
Changes: Implement logging functionality in the authentication module.
Acceptance checks: Verify that successful login attempts are recorded with the required details.

tasks.title: Implement logging for failed logins
tasks.description:
Goal: To ensure failed login attempts are logged.
Changes: Add logging functionality for failed logins in the authentication module.
Acceptance checks: Verify that failed login attempts are recorded with the required details.

tasks.title: Enhance logs to include user details
tasks.description:
Goal: To include user_id, IP, User-Agent, and timestamp in logs.
Changes: Modify the logging structure to capture additional user details.
Acceptance checks: Verify that logs contain all specified user details.

tasks.title: Implement configurable log retention period
tasks.description:
Goal: To allow configuration of log retention period.
Changes: Add a configuration option for log retention in the database.
Acceptance checks: Verify that the retention period can be set and logs are deleted accordingly.

tasks.title: Implement security logging for lockout events
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure that security logs are generated whenever a lockout event occurs.
Changes: Add logging functionality to the authentication module.
Acceptance checks: Verify that logs are created for each lockout event.

tasks.title: Set up brute-force alerting mechanism
tasks.description:
Goal: Implement an alerting system for excessive login attempts from a single IP.
Changes: Integrate alerting logic into the authentication service.
Acceptance checks: Test that alerts are triggered after a defined number of failed attempts.

tasks.title: Implement parameterized queries for SQL interactions
tasks.description:
Goal: Protect against SQL injection by using parameterized queries.
Changes: Refactor existing SQL queries to use ORM or parameterized syntax.
Acceptance checks: Conduct security testing to ensure no SQL injection vulnerabilities exist.

tasks.title: Sanitize input values to prevent XSS attacks
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure all input values are sanitized to prevent cross-site scripting (XSS).
Changes: Implement input validation and sanitization in the authentication module.
Acceptance checks: Test various input scenarios to confirm that XSS is mitigated.

tasks.title: Review and document security logging implementation
tasks.description:
Goal: Provide documentation for the security logging feature.
Changes: Create a document outlining the logging process and its importance.
Acceptance checks: Ensure documentation is clear and accessible to the development team.

tasks.title: Implement Rate Limiting for Login API
tasks.description:
Goal: To ensure that the login API is protected against excessive requests.
Changes: Implement rate limiting logic in the backend for the login endpoint.
Acceptance checks: Verify that the rate limiting is applied correctly under load.

tasks.title: Handle HTTP 429 Response for Rate Limit Exceedance
tasks.description:
Goal: To provide appropriate feedback when the rate limit is exceeded.
Changes: Modify the response handling to return HTTP 429 status code when the limit is reached.
Acceptance checks: Ensure that the correct status code is returned and that the response message is clear.

tasks.title: Implement Tamper-Evident Logging for Rate Limiting
tasks.description:
Goal: To ensure that logs related to rate limiting are secure and tamper-evident.
Changes: Set up a logging mechanism that stores logs in a tamper-evident format.
Acceptance checks: Verify that logs cannot be altered and are stored securely.

tasks.title: Implement Asynchronous I/O for Authentication
tasks.description:
Goal: Enhance the authentication process to support asynchronous I/O.
Changes: Refactor the authentication service to utilize asynchronous programming techniques.
Acceptance checks: Verify that the authentication process can handle multiple requests concurrently without blocking.

tasks.title: Optimize Login API Response Time
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure the login API responds within the target time.
Changes: Analyze and optimize the current implementation of the login API.
Acceptance checks: Measure response times and confirm they are consistently under 200ms.

tasks.title: Implement Secure Error Handling for Authentication
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure error responses do not reveal internal system information.
Changes: Update error handling logic to provide generic error messages.
Acceptance checks: Test various error scenarios to confirm no sensitive information is exposed.

tasks.title: Redirect to Business Screens on Successful Authentication
tasks.description:
Goal: Transition users to business screens only after successful authentication.
Changes: Implement logic to check authentication status before redirecting.
Acceptance checks: Verify that users are only redirected upon successful login.

tasks.title: Implement Role-Based Initial Screen Branching
tasks.description:
Goal: Branch initial screens based on user role permissions.
Changes: Develop logic to determine the initial screen based on user roles.
Acceptance checks: Test with different user roles to ensure correct screen is displayed.

tasks.title: Performance Testing for Login API
tasks.description:
Goal: Validate the performance of the login API under load.
Changes: Create and execute performance tests for the login API.
Acceptance checks: Ensure the API meets the response time requirements under various load conditions.

tasks.title: Documentation for Error Handling Practices
tasks.description:
Goal: Document the error handling practices for the authentication process.
Changes: Write comprehensive documentation outlining the error handling strategy.
Acceptance checks: Review documentation for clarity and completeness.
